PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Technical Support Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 07, 2025, 15:44 IST
 Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 07-Aug-2025 |  Chandigarh |  Salary : 20,000 to 20,000




FOLLOW

The Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Diploma can apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the given address. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Chandigarh.

PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Technical Support 	01	10th Pass, Diploma

Age Limit for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 28 years.

Selection Process for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 20,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Technical Support Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the interview along with the CV and required documents at the address given below.

Address

Department of Medical Microbiology, GIMER, Chandigarh 160012

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	19-08-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
